document_title: Sore throat: Causes, symptoms and prevention
subsection_content:
Sore throat is a condition in which the throat is painful, burning and can be accompanied by many other symptoms. Symptoms will depend on the cause of the sore throat. There are many causes of sore throat but the most common are sore throat due to tonsillitis and adenoiditis.
MSc.BSc.CKI Nguyen Thi Thuc Nhu, Department of Ear, Nose and Throat, Tam Anh General Hospital, Ho Chi Minh City, said that a sore throat is not a disease. These are just symptoms of inflammation, respiratory infection or a symptom of some underlying disease.
subsection_title: dau hong.json. What is a sore throat?
